pages.text: $(italic)You think back happily to the days when you set little traps for your friends. Touching the wrong block, they were completely buried by sand.$(br)By now, your friends aren't so easily fooled. Seems like modern problems require modern solutions.$(br2)So much room for possibilities!

By adding redstone and a bit of magic to sand, it gains an interesting property: like other blocks, it stays in the air until the redstone gemstones inside it start vibrating. Redstone Sand behaves like a normal block until the moment it gets a redstone signal.$(br)The redstone trigger propagates through all connected blocks, destabilizing them and laws of gravity force it to drop.
